name: Thriller Genre
description: Suspenseful and tense narratives with psychological tension, mystery, and edge-of-seat anticipation

prompt.base: Thriller atmosphere, high tension, suspenseful mood, dramatic shadows, intense color grading, tight framing, psychological pressure, ominous undertones, mystery elements
prompt.positive: dramatic lighting, deep shadows, tense atmosphere, mysterious mood, intense expressions, psychological depth, suspenseful composition, ominous colors, tight close-ups, anxious energy, hidden threats, paranoid atmosphere
prompt.negative: bright cheerful lighting, relaxed mood, comedy elements, fantasy whimsy, peaceful atmosphere, soft focus, pastel colors, lighthearted tone

technical.color_palette: Desaturated with strategic color accents, cool tones
technical.lighting: High contrast with dramatic shadows, chiaroscuro
technical.composition: Tight framing, dutch angles, claustrophobic spaces

variations.name: Psychological Thriller
variations.modifier: mental instability, subjective reality, distorted perspectives, paranoid atmosphere, mind games

variations.name: Action Thriller
variations.modifier: high-stakes action, chase sequences, dynamic movement, explosive energy, adrenaline-fueled

variations.name: Crime Thriller
variations.modifier: urban grit, detective work, criminal underworld, noir influences, investigative atmosphere

examples: A character looking over their shoulder in a dark alley, dramatic side lighting, tense expression, deep shadows creating mystery
Close-up of anxious eyes reflected in a rearview mirror, desaturated colors, high contrast, suspenseful atmosphere
